item.title: Join us in Asia at the Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group to celebrate the holiday season
item.description:
To celebrate the holiday season, the Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group is offering special packages at several of its Asian properties. Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong Source: Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong website. Mother with daughter in a Christmas setting. The hotel will be adorned with festive decorations, and guests will be treated to classic Christmas treats. Starting from HKD4,200 per night, the Winter Getaway package, available from December 1, 2018, to January 6, 2019, includes accommodations, daily breakfast for two, and special holiday amenities...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/join-us-in-asia-at-the-mandarin-oriental-hotel-group-to-celebrate-the-holiday-season/

item.title: The Jia Wei Chinese Restaurant is launching a fresh new menu
item.description:
Source: Accor Hotels.
The Jia Wei Chinese Restaurant, found within the Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy, has introduced a new menu to coincide with the arrival of their new head chef, Victor. The dishes are meant to complement the restaurant’s modern Eastern aesthetic and embody the Chinese principle of “家味,” signifying “flavors of home.”
The menu features popular Eastern dishes like Chef’s superior fish maw served with seafood soup, and fresh prawns accompanied by two special sauces...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-jia-wei-chinese-restaurant-is-launching-a-fresh-new-menu/
